title: Looking forward to testing you on strings, This assignment checks you on what can do differently with strings operations.

questionText.text:
Given a string, return a version without the first and last char, so "Hello" yields ell. The string length will be at least 2.
withoutEnd("Hello") → ell
withoutEnd("java") → av
withoutEnd("coding") → odin
Check your program against test cases below as a zip file. Submit your solution(zip file) when all test cases are passed
